message.content:
Subject: Resignation Letter - [Your Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you of my decision to resign from my position at [Company Name]. After careful consideration and weighing multiple factors, I have come to the conclusion that it is in my best interest to pursue other opportunities. 

Throughout my time here at [Company Name], I have gained valuable experience and skills that will serve me well in my future endeavors. I am grateful for the support and guidance provided by you and our team, which has played a significant role in my professional growth. 

My last day at the company will be [last working day] to ensure a smooth transition for my responsibilities. Please let me know if there is any additional information or documentation needed during this time. 

Thank you for your understanding and I appreciate all of the opportunities you have provided me over the years. 

Please feel free to contact me at [your phone number] if you have any questions or concerns. 

Best regards,

[Your Full Name]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]
